messages.subject: Re: humor being entirely missed
messages.msgSnippet: You are sooo right! I was obviously half asleep while I was reading this! Now that I read it with my full brain power it s so obvious. I feel just a bit
messages.messageBody:
You are sooo right! I was obviously half asleep while
I was reading this! Now that I read it with my full
brain power it's so obvious. I feel just a bit foolish
<sg> (sheepish grin).

Meghan

It was totally and entirely tongue-in-cheek humor
intended to make
light
without malice.
It wasn't a "conclusion."

(Review of the humor in question:)

<< ** or maybe I've seen too many episodes of the
X-files?

Betsy>>

<<There y'go. Evil TV made you unreasonably afraid of
TV.

Sandra>> >>



Sandra

messages.msgSnippet: -=-Nowhere in Besty s post do I read (or read into it) that she s afraid of TV!  I m really baffled (after reading quite a bit of your posts) as to how you
messages.messageBody:
-=-Nowhere in Besty's post do I read (or read into it)
that she's afraid of TV! I'm really baffled (after
reading quite a bit of your posts) as to how you reach
your conclusions.-=-

It was totally and entirely tongue-in-cheek humor intended to make light
without malice.
It wasn't a "conclusion."

(Review of the humor in question:)

<< ** or maybe I've seen too many episodes of the
X-files?

Betsy>>

<<There y'go. Evil TV made you unreasonably afraid of
TV.

Sandra>> >>



Sandra
